Method.name: GetCities
CityToJSON
Method.Implementation: set city = $this set proxy = {} set proxy.id = ..%Id() set proxy.city = ..city set proxy.latitude = ..latitude set proxy.longitude = ..longitude quit proxy.%ToJSON()

UDLText.name: T

Method.name: NearestCities
Method.Implementation: set sql="select top("_top_") * , sqrt(square(latitude-("_ "select latitude from fishnet.City " _ "where id = "_pointId_"))+square(longitude-("_ "select longitude from fishnet.City "_ "where id = "_pointId_"))) as dist from fishnet.City order by dist" q ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,sql)

Method.name: haversine
Method.Implementation: set rlat1 = lat1*$ZPI/180 set rlat2 = lat2*$ZPI/180 set rlon1 = lon1*$ZPI/180 set rlon2 = lon2*$ZPI/180 quit $ZARCSIN($ZSQR($ZPOWER($ZSIN((rlat1-rlat2)/2),2)+ ($ZCOS(rlat1)*$ZCOS(rlat2)*$ZPOWER($ZSIN((rlon1-rlon2)/2),2))))*12742

Method.name: NearestCitiesByCoord
Method.Implementation: set sql="select top("_top_") * , geodistance.City_haversine(latitude,"_lat_",longitude,"_lon_") as dist from geodistance.City order by dist" q ##class(%ZEN.Auxiliary.jsonSQLProvider).%WriteJSONFromSQL(,sql)

Method.name: Geobox
Method.Implementation: set latTop = srclat + (dist/69) set longLft = srclong - (dist/$ZABS($ZCOS((srclat*3.14)/180)*69)) set latBot = srclat - (dist/69) set longRgt = srclong + (dist/$ZABS($ZCOS((srclat*3.14)/180)*69)) return latTop,longLft,latBot,longRgt
